insert into webtest.t_admin(username, password, name, sex, birthday, power, jiguan) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.birthday}, #{entity.power}, #{entity.jiguan})

insert into webtest.t_admin(username, password, name, sex, birthday, power, jiguan) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.birthday}, #{entity.power}, #{entity.jiguan})
on duplicate key update username = values(username) , password = values(password) , name = values(name) , sex = values(sex) , birthday = values(birthday) , power = values(power) , jiguan = values(jiguan)
